name: Keyword Coverage
description: Tracks branded and non-branded keyword performance, including AI search query patterns.

insights.title: Strong Branded Keyword Dominance
insights.description: You rank #1 for 94% of branded keywords, maintaining strong brand protection.

insights.title: Growing Long-tail Coverage
insights.description: Non-branded long-tail keyword coverage increased 18% this quarter.

insights.title: AI Query Pattern Match
insights.description: Your content aligns with 67% of conversational AI query patterns in your niche.

issues.title: Low Non-Branded Coverage
issues.description: Only 34% coverage for non-branded terms in your core category vs 52% industry average.

issues.title: Keyword Cannibalization
issues.description: 5 keyword clusters have multiple pages competing, diluting ranking potential.

issues.title: Missing Question Keywords
issues.description: Not ranking for common 'how', 'what', 'why' queries that AI prioritizes.

recommendations.description: Build comprehensive content hubs around 10 priority non-branded topic clusters.
Consolidate competing pages and implement proper internal linking hierarchy.
Create FAQ pages and Q&A content targeting conversational AI queries.
